Name: WordBed
About the game: It's you against WordBed for the highest score. Find as many words as you can and then have your words eliminated from the board. The board is then compressed down and you continue playing. When you are done, WordBed gives it a try. An array of game sounds confirm every board action taken. Change letters for higher scores. BEAT WordBed and get an audio surprise. Features: Large word database: over 200,000 words Easy to learn, hard to master Enjoy exciting background music Change letters Itâ€™s you versus WordBed for the best word search score *** See website for full play instructions ***
